subject: Super Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: Peggy Beisel-McIlwaine was among the 400 ticket-holders forced to watch the Super Bowl from standing-room spots in Cowboys Stadium because their seats were not safe.
snippet: Peggy Beisel-McIlwaine was among the 400 ticket-holders forced to watch the Super Bowl from standing-room spots in Cowboys Stadium because their seats were not safe.
